title: ChatGPT maker OpenAI faces class action over how it used people’s data
description: A California law firm is suing OpenAI for violating the privacy and property rights of countless people when it used their internet data to train its AI tech.

title: New Gen Z graduates are fluent in AI and ready to join the workforce
description: Generation Z has been leveraging generative AI to discover what it can do, and they’re joining the workforce excited to explore the new technology.

title: Is the ‘internet apocalypse’ nigh? Breaking down the solar-storm science.
description: The idea of a widespread internet outage caused by a solar superstorm has captured imaginations and sparked misinformation, but concern isn't totally unfounded.
